S

SolarMain - Class in <Unnamed>
A class to implement the gui and take in inputs from the user to insert solar objects into the solar system
SolarMain() - Constructor for class SolarMain
A main constructor that displays the gui Randomly scatters solarobjects as stars Contains a while loop that is continuous and inserts any solarobject inputted by the user in the gui Inserts the Sun which is made with multiple solar objects to make it look more realistic A method from the SolarSystem class to refresh the display after every loop
SolarSystem - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides a graphical user interface to a model of the solar system

SolarSystemGUI - Class in <Unnamed>
A class to provide a simple GUI to add and remove planets and moons in a solar system.
SolarSystemGUI() - Constructor for class SolarSystemGUI
Creates a new SolarSystemGUI A simple graphical user interface is displayed, which prompts the user to enter data relating to new planets and moons.
